0.0.2.name: wordpress/custom-bulkquick-edit
0.0.2.description:
Custom Bulk/Quick Edit plugin allows you to add custom fields to the edit screen bulk and quick edit panels.

Automatically detects custom fields that use the manage_{$post_type}_posts_columns filter.

To use this Custom Bulk/Quick Edit plugin with custom post types, please purchase Custom Bulk/Quick Edit Premium.

Limitations

Currently, only text input and textarea fields are supported.

Primary Features

  • API of actions and filters
  • Auto detects most post custom fields
  • Settings export/import
  • Settings screen

Settings Options

Post

  • Enable excerpts?
  • Enable "custom field"? - Configure as text input or textarea

Compatibility & Reset
